audio_help.step_1: Find your podcast/audio on a platform
audio_help.step_2: Copy the episode or show URL
audio_help.step_3: Paste it here and we'll detect it automatically
audio_help.page_description: Complete list of podcast, music, and audiobook platforms you can share on {siteName}
audio_help.no_results: No platforms found matching your search

spotify.name: Spotify
spotify.description: The most popular streaming platform for podcasts and music
spotify.how_to_copy: Open the episode or show, click '...' (more options), select 'Share' and copy the browser link

ivoox.name: iVoox
ivoox.how_to_copy: Play the episode, right-click on the player, select 'Copy audio URL' or copy the URL from the browser bar

apple_podcasts.name: Apple Podcasts
apple_podcasts.how_to_copy: Open the episode or podcast, click the share button (arrow icon) and select 'Copy link'

anchor.name: Anchor
anchor.description: Podcast hosting and distribution platform (part of Spotify)
anchor.how_to_copy: Go to the episode, click 'Share', then 'Copy link' or copy the URL directly from the browser

spreaker.name: Spreaker
spreaker.description: Podcast platform with creation and distribution tools
spreaker.how_to_copy: Open the show or episode, click the 'Share' button and copy the provided link

transistor.name: Transistor
transistor.description: Professional podcast hosting for businesses and brands
transistor.how_to_copy: Click 'Share this episode', then copy the share URL that appears

buzzsprout.name: Buzzsprout
buzzsprout.how_to_copy: Open the episode, click the share icon and copy the direct link

podbean.name: Podbean
podbean.how_to_copy: Go to the episode, click 'Share' and copy the episode URL or simply copy the browser URL

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.how_to_copy: Click the share button on the player and copy the episode link

castos.name: Castos
castos.description: Podcast hosting for WordPress and websites
castos.how_to_copy: Play the episode and copy the URL directly from the player or browser bar

acast.name: Acast
acast.how_to_copy: Open the episode, click 'Share' and copy the share link

megaphone.name: Megaphone
megaphone.how_to_copy: Click the share button on the player and copy the episode URL

simplecast.name: Simplecast
simplecast.how_to_copy: Open the episode and copy the player URL or use the 'Share' button

podigee.name: Podigee
podigee.how_to_copy: Go to the episode and copy the URL directly from the browser or use the share button

google_podcasts.name: Google Podcasts
google_podcasts.how_to_copy: Open the podcast or episode, click 'Share' and copy the link

soundcloud.name: SoundCloud
soundcloud.description: Platform for sharing user-created music and audio
soundcloud.how_to_copy: Click the 'Share' button below the player, then copy the link that appears

bandcamp.name: Bandcamp
bandcamp.how_to_copy: Open the song or album, click 'Share/Embed', then copy the browser URL

mixcloud.name: Mixcloud
mixcloud.description: Streaming platform for DJ mixes and radio shows
mixcloud.how_to_copy: Click the share button (arrow icon) and copy the mix link

audioboom.name: Audioboom
audioboom.description: Platform for podcasts and on-demand audio content
audioboom.how_to_copy: Open the post, click 'Share' and copy the provided link

deezer.name: Deezer
deezer.how_to_copy: Click '...' (more options) on the song, select 'Share' and copy the link

audible.name: Audible
audible.how_to_copy: Open the audiobook, click 'Share' and copy the product link
